db:abstract.db:para: The Drag and Drop Puzzle example demonstrates a way of using the drag and drop system with item view widgets.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = mainwindow.h \ pieceslist.h \ puzzlewidget.h RESOURCES = puzzle.qrc SOURCES = main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp \ pieceslist.cpp \ puzzlewidget.cpp
QMAKE_PROJECT_NAME = dndpuzzle
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/draganddrop/puzzle INSTALLS += target
wince*: { addFile.files = example.jpg addFile.path = . DEPLOYMENT += addFile }
